docs.title: AutoShiftOps 🚀
docs.text:
Smarter DevOps Automation | Reliable CI/CD Pipelines | Intelligent Infrastructure Monitoring

Welcome to AutoShiftOps — your partner in accelerating software delivery. Our platform helps teams automate, observe, and optimize their DevOps workflows without the complexity.

docs.title: 🚀 CI/CD Intelligence
docs.text: Build, test, and deploy with confidence using auto-scaling, self-healing pipelines. Integrate seamlessly with GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or your favorite CI/CD tool.

docs.title: 📊 Infrastructure Monitoring (SmartOps)
docs.text: Real-time health checks, alerting, and visual analytics. Stay ahead of outages with predictive monitoring.

docs.title: 🤖 Automation Engine
docs.text: Simplify ops with plug-and-play automation modules: Kubernetes scaling, log shipping, cloud cost optimizers.

docs.title: 👥 Who It’s For
docs.text:
• DevOps Teams tired of pipeline firefighting
  • SREs looking for actionable monitoring and reduced MTTR
  • Startups & SMEs scaling infra without scaling chaos

docs.title: 🔐 Why AutoShiftOps?
docs.text:
• ✅ 100% GitHub-native integration
  • ⚡ Blazing fast, no-code automation triggers
  • 📦 Works with AWS, GCP, Azure, and Kubernetes
  • 📈 Lightweight — no vendor lock-in, no bloat

docs.title: 📬 Join the Early Access Program
docs.text:
We're onboarding a limited number of teams to co-design features and shape the roadmap.

Join the Waitlist

🧠 Want a guided demo or have feedback? Contact us ⬆️

docs.title: About AutoShiftOps
docs.text:
AutoShiftOps was born out of frustration with bloated DevOps tools, flaky pipelines, and hard-to-scale infrastructure.

We're a team of experienced DevOps engineers, SREs, and builders passionate about making DevOps intelligent, efficient, and stress-free.

docs.title: 🌟 Our Mission
docs.text: Empower every tech team — from startup to enterprise — with smart automation and actionable insights that scale.

docs.title: 👥 Meet the Core Team
docs.text:
• Founder & DevOps Lead – Sajja Sudhakararao

🚀 Backed by years of hands-on experience in cloud-native architecture, observability, and automation tooling.

docs.title: Contact Us
docs.text:
Have a question, idea, or just want to say hi?

We’d love to hear from you. Whether you’re a DevOps leader, startup founder, or curious engineer — reach out!

📫 Email us: hello@autoshiftops.com 💬 GitHub: Discussions 🐦 Twitter: @AutoShiftOps (create this in Step 3)

We respond within 24–48 hours.

docs.title: Roadmap
docs.text: We’re building AutoShiftOps in the open, with early adopters shaping the features.

docs.title: ✅ Q2 2025 (Now)
docs.text:
• Smart GitHub CI/CD connector
  • Customizable notification rules
  • Real-time infrastructure dashboard (beta)
  • Early Access Waitlist launch

docs.title: 🛠 Q3 2025
docs.text:
• Auto-remediation playbooks
  • Kubernetes resource optimizer
  • Slack & Discord alerting integration

docs.title: 🧠 Future (Late 2025+)
docs.text:
• AI-based anomaly detection
  • Auto RCA + root-cause suggestions
  • Team metrics & burn insights
